 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: "Punom Parom" was cooking reality show aired on Croatian RTL Television. In each episode several amateur cooks and enthusiasts would try out their culinary skills cooking in professional restaurant kitchen. They were mentored and monitored by professional chef of the restaurant where they cooked for the guests who tried and rated their food. Usually same group of amateur cooks would compete for the whole week (5 episodes) gathering points. The winner was the one who managed to score largest amount of points.
imdb.title: Punom parom
plot: "Punom Parom" was cooking reality show aired on Croatian RTL Television. In each episode several amateur cooks and enthusiasts would try out their culinary skills cooking in professional restaurant kitchen. They were mentored and monitored by professional chef of the restaurant where they cooked for the guests who tried and rated their food. Usually same group of amateur cooks would compete for the whole week (5 episodes) gathering points. The winner was the one who managed to score largest amount of points.
